meanings.definition: A type of offal, specifically the entrails of an animal.
meanings.sent1: The chef used the umble to make a delicious stew.
meanings.sent2: The umble was carefully removed from the animal before cooking.
meanings.sent3: The umble decided to take a vacation from being inside the animal.
meanings.sent4: The umble was the hidden treasure of the animal, full of surprises.
meanings.sent5: The umble looked like a mysterious puzzle waiting to be solved.

meanings.sent1: She tends to umble when she is nervous.
meanings.sent2: Please don't umble your words, speak clearly.
meanings.sent3: The toddler liked to umble made-up words while playing.
meanings.sent4: His umbling voice was like a distant echo in the room.
meanings.sent5: The wind seemed to umble through the trees, whispering secrets.
